title: Cheltenham Caravan Retro Vintage Restoration Project Rare Pu

posts.content:
http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/191299875265? ... 26_rdc%3D1

This is a fantastic base caravan for a restoration.

I believe it to be a 1967 PUKU 2 berth, with all original plates, very rare in the UK!!

I bought this originally to tow behind my VW Splitscreen campervan but it is just a little too heavy for the old boy! I have since bought a lighter Eriba caravan.

I went for this as there is no major damp and fantastic interior, I was going to paint and colour code the outside to match our van.


The caravan is in good condition but if it was me it does need a repaint outside. The current paint job aint the best but the caravan itself is very very straight!!

Electrics are fully working and it still has the original cooker/fridge/sink but have not tested these altho the 240v hook is working perfectly. The leisure battery is dead but could be recharged....

All units are intact as well as the table and a new carpet has been fitted.

It looks to me this went through a restoration a few years ago and new rubber seals fitted all around. The cooker / sink / windows are in really good condition!!

One of the legs is very very stiff and will need attention and the key is missing for one of the doors. There is a spare door included in the sale as well as the following:-

Bin
Vintage Porta-loo
Cooker
Sink
Cooker
Bowl
240v
Several plugs
Extra door.

I have more photos available to people and I would say the paintwork most definitely needs attention altho could be used as is!

The caravan is available for viewing and would recommend you nip and see it!!

Â£150 deposit within 24 hrs of listing finishing!!!
